json: [   "Hope is not about falling but rising again.",   "Every failure is a step toward a new beginning.",   "Don't forget your wings; you can rise again.",   "The sun always rises, and so will you.",   "You only lose when you stop trying.",   "A small step can lead to a big change.",   "Even a bird carries messages;
